system:

feature {NONE} -- Initialization

f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_fixed_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Initialize Current. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_set_c_objectset_c_object ({../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_fixed_newgtk_fixed_new) {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_fixed_set_has_windowgtk_fixed_set_has_window (../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_container_widgetcontainer_widget, True) ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor end
feature -- Status setting

f_set_item_size../implementation_gtk/ev_fixed_imp.xml#f_set_item_sizeset_item_size (a_widget: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET; a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set a_widget.width to a_width. -- Set a_widget.height to a_height. local w_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_imp.xmlEV_WIDGET_IMP do w_imp ?= a_widget.../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation check w_imp /= Void then end ../implementation_gtk/ev_fixed_imp.xml#f_set_item_position_and_sizeset_item_position_and_size (a_widget, ../implementation_gtk/ev_fixed_imp.xml#f_x_position_of_childx_position_of_child (w_imp), ../implementation_gtk/ev_fixed_imp.xml#f_y_position_of_childy_position_of_child (w_imp), a_width, a_height) end
